Articles.Content:
In order to facilitate the creation of ocean-based warships, I'm posting the craft for the Sobek-class interceptor.

This isn't the best ship, but it goes to show how easy it is to make ocean craft.

Craft File:

http://www./view/b2jjxk73mn5wjmx/daeCorp_-_ONV31_Sobek.craft

Edited October 24, 2013 by daemonCaptrix

My new fast escort Took a page from Star Trek Online for inspiration. Well balanced though lightly armored but very fast and long ranged, and only 347 parts fully loaded. I can launch two in to orbit at once though it takes a while to get all 938 parts up there. I'm working on getting a balanced single sided launch but with all the wings it very difficult.

Behold the Warbird

My new fast escort Took a page from Star Trek Online for inspiration.

It looks a lot like the Ar'kif Tactical Warbird.

It's inspired by Ar'kif and the D'shara my STO toon had an Ar'kif. I'm working on a Bird of Pray next and the D7. The D7 is going to be awesome.

Total armament 8 light missiles and 2 medium missiles.

Inspired by the Romulan Valdore-class warbird from Star Trek: Nemesis, The Praetorianus-class Battleship is armed with ten drone torpedoes mounted laterally on the neck, and possesses heavy armour over the most important systems.

Based loosely on the Klingon B'rel-class bird of prey, the Raider-class gunboat. Heavy fighters that come armed with three MAC guns and six mini drone missiles.

probably doesn't help that I just woke up
winner gets to plant a flag.Flags will be like a show of victory 1 flag=1 win.

winner gets to plant a flag.Flags will be like a show of victory 1 flag=1 win.

Three. MAC. Guns!!!

How the

I don't even

Any chance you can send a craft file as i'm having trouble getting mine to work properly.

As always amazing looking ships though!

How are we walking on a fine line, when the Spirit Wolf Handland thread is all about RP. I have seen no RP what so ever on this thread, no mention of ones corporation in the first person no declarations of all out war. They are not policing threads like that or every corporate thread should also be locked. And even if they were its a game for crying out loud.

And not to argue that we should i know you have decided and its your thread so i agree with your judgement 100% but if on another thread a game like i mentioned before was to be made it is not RP it is simply a board game and not against any rules. That said with Spartwo in charge and making sure that we are completely complaint we have nothing to fear.

Edited October 25, 2013 by camulus777
Drop the subject, please.

Ok posing a different subject

I may want to battle some soon. Im thinking I can on Sunday. Anyone up for a battle?

Also as a new conversation topic.

What is your best battle?

Mine was the Battle of Pol vs Spartwo

4 Bayonets MKIII vs 3 Salvation MKI and one Archangel prototype

I may have lost the battle but I think I proved that I can contend with the top dogs

Great battle Spartwo

what mod is that that allows you to color your ships.

I'm just wondering if they should add something like it to the real game.

ya it and one that allows you to add your logo to bits. I don't like the mod one it acts odd.
